titleStmt.title: The dysclosi[n]g of the canon of the popysh masse wyth a sermon annexed vnto it, of the famous clerke, of worthye memorye. D. Marten Luther.
titleStmt.author: Luther, Martin, 1483-1546. aut

notesStmt.note: Imprint from STC, since copy as filmed lacks colophon.

Caption title on leaf B3r reads: A sermon made by the famous clerk of worthy memorye, Doctour Marten Luther, of the greate blasphemy agaynst God, which the Papystes daylie do vse, readyng thys Antechristian canon in theyr masses.
Imperfect; lacks all after leaf B3.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
